name: Yugen Saga
description: Prepare to enter the world of Yugen Saga as a Lutian, a child of The Yue - the source of all magic and life in this world. You will wake up in the land of Extrico, in the kingdom of Patrian. The king of this land has gone missing and the world is not what it once was. Monsters and other evil-beings roam the lands, and very few places are left safe. Where has the king gone to? What has happened to this world? The answer to these questions are out there...Somewhere. But the world is a big place, and this may only be the first step in your quest. Discover the truth. Discover the magic in Yue.
